name: Venture To The Beginning
description:
You almost successed your quest to gain space-time warping powers --but you got interrupted by a being of another dimension. It attempts to send you back in time and take the powerful gems for itself. Collect the gems and use their power to stop the creature.

  • Most of the sound effects are from http://pdsounds.tuxfamily.org/.
  • "Grassy Tileset (Dawnbringer 16 color palette)" by Impossible Realms .
  • And also, thank you Brackeys for your great tutorials!

Note: The end, unfortunately, is bugged. The final scene was suppose to show the "creature" trying to send you back in time but you now have the gems so you can use them to rewind the attack (see more on devlog).
